# About {-}

This is document describes the technical detail behind the time series included in the **ICES Report on Ocean Climate**. 


## Proposed order {-}
1. Barents and Nordic Seas
2. Baffin Bay
3. North American Shelf
4. Deep Basins
5. North-East Subpolar Gyre
6. North-West European Shelf
7. Baltic Sea
8. Biscay, Iberia and Canaries
